cmp: 坐 (to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc.))

exm.mng: setback, reverse, check, defeat, frustration, disappointment, to frustrate, to discourage, to set sb back, to blunt, to subdue
to thwart, to foil (sb's plans), to defeat
(of sales, prices etc) to fall, to drop, decline, slump
a transition (stop and change) in spoken sound, music or in brush strokes, a cadence, punctuated by a transition, with syncopated cadence (brush stroke in painting)
